Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-57850 affecting package kernel for versions less than 5.15.176.3-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-57850 affecting package kernel for versions less than 5.15.176.3-3. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package kernel is earlier than 5.15.176.3-3, affected by CVE-2024-57850
